mapper.select: select task.TASK_ID as taskId , task.TASK_NAME as taskName , task.WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId , task.DESCRIPTION as description , task.STATUS as status , task.PRIORITY as priority , task.START_DATE as startDate , task.END_DATE as endDate , task.BU_ID as buId , task.CREATED_DATE as createdDate , task.CREATED_BY as createdBy , concat(cr.FIRST_NAME,' ',cr.LAST_NAME) as createdByName , task.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate , task.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy , concat(upd.FIRST_NAME,' ',upd.LAST_NAME) as updatedByName from tb_wf_task task left join tb_user cr on cr.ID =task.CREATED_BY left join tb_user upd on upd.ID =task.UPDATED_BY where task.WORKFLOW_ID=#{workflowId}

select task.TASK_ID as taskId , task.TASK_NAME as taskName , task.WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId , task.DESCRIPTION as description , task.STATUS as status , task.PRIORITY as priority , task.START_DATE as startDate , task.END_DATE as endDate , task.BU_ID as buId , task.CREATED_DATE as createdDate , task.CREATED_BY as createdBy , concat(cr.FIRST_NAME,' ',cr.LAST_NAME) as createdByName , task.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate , task.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy , concat(upd.FIRST_NAME,' ',upd.LAST_NAME) as updatedByName from tb_wf_task task left join tb_user cr on cr.ID =task.CREATED_BY left join tb_user upd on upd.ID =task.UPDATED_BY where task.TASK_ID=#{taskId} limit 1
